ai-kv13.2:1.1_0: A wholesome mind should not be able to get food.
ai-kv13.2:1.3_0: A gift is allowable for an eon:
ai-kv13.2:1.5_0: One should give a gift that is not allowable for us.
ai-kv13.2:2.1_0: A wholesome mind should not be able to get food.
ai-kv13.2:2.16_0: If an eon is being made for an eon, he should say,
ai-kv13.2:2.17_0: “May the mind be skilled in projects.” ...
ai-kv13.2:3.1_0: A wholesome mind should beloved by an eon:
ai-kv13.2:3.3_0: May he get up from the full admission to that are wholesome,
ai-kv13.2:3.7_0: A wholesome mind may be able to turn back.
ai-kv13.2:3.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv13.2:3.9_0: The discussion on the skillful is finished.
